abilities.name: Star Light
abilities.effect: As long as your opponent has any Pokémon-ex or Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon in play, Jirachi ex pays Colorless less Energy to use Shield Beam or Super Psy Bolt.

attacks.name: Shield Beam
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't use any Poké-Powers on his or her Pokémon.
